entities.name: clea
entities.description: The person who is pretending to be cleaning and sneaking something off to their room.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: A house-elf who is loyal to the Master's family and is trying to protect a tapestry.

entities.name: master
entities.description: The person who owns the house where Kreacher is working.

entities.name: mistress
entities.description: The mistress of the house, who would never forgive Kreacher if the tapestry was thrown out.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: A person who is trying to get rid of a Permanent Sticking Charm on the back of the tapestry.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: A place where people are imprisoned.

relationships.description: Sirius is trying to get rid of the Permanent Sticking Charm on the back of the tapestry.
Kreacher is trying to protect the tapestry.
The Mistress has authority over Kreacher.
